formulas.name: Factorial
formulas.description: Product of all positive integers up to n

formulas.name: Permutation (nPr)
formulas.description: Number of ways to arrange r objects from n distinct objects. Order MATTERS.

formulas.name: Combination (nCr)
formulas.description: Number of ways to select r objects from n. Order does NOT matter.

formulas.name: Relation nPr and nCr
formulas.description: Permutation = Combination × arrangement of selected items

formulas.name: Symmetry Property
formulas.description: Choosing r items is same as leaving out (n−r) items

formulas.name: Circular Permutation
formulas.description: Linear arrangements / n to remove rotational duplicates

formulas.name: Necklace/Bracelet Permutation
formulas.description: Circular permutation with no distinction between clockwise and counterclockwise

formulas.name: Permutation with Identical Objects
formulas.description: p, q, r are frequencies of repeated objects

formulas.name: Derangement
formulas.description: Permutations where NO element is in its original position

formulas.name: Stars and Bars
formulas.formula: C(n+r−1, r−1) for n identical objects into r distinct boxes
formulas.description: Distribution of identical objects. Non-negative solutions to x₁+x₂+...+xr = n.

formulas.name: Complementary Counting
formulas.description: Count what you DON'T want and subtract from total

formulas.name: Selection with Repetition
formulas.formula: Each of r positions has n choices → n^r total
formulas.description: When repetition is allowed, multiply choices for each position

formulas.name: Sum of All Combinations
formulas.description: Total number of subsets of a set with n elements
